original_text:
“There is none like God, O Jeshurun,
    who rides through the heavens to your help,
    through the skies in his majesty.
korean_text: 여수룬이여 하나님 같은 이가 없도다 그가 너를 도우시려고 하늘을 타고 궁창에서 위엄을 나타내시는도다

sentences.original_text: who rides through the heavens to your help,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너를 돕기 위해 하늘을 타고 가시며,

sentences.original_text: through the skies in his majesty.
